Articles.Content:
Is there a mod out there that stops physics time slow down so 1sec.=1sec.

Can someone point me to it.

Thx.

Try setting your Max Physics Delta Time slider all the way to the left. It allows less time to physics calculations, so the in-game time is more proportional to real time, but at the cost of lower framerate and less accurate physics. If that's not enough, you can try messing with the PHYSICS_FRAME_DT_LIMIT in settings.cfg, although I wouldn't recommend it...

Better Time Warp offers lossless physics warping.

Edited May 23, 2021 by Snark
